PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-14822005-08-30,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY
ActDepartment of Industry Act
PrecisApproval of the establishment, on September 1, 2005, of an advisory committee, to be known as the Telecommunications Policy Review Panel, to provide recommendations and a report to the Minister of Industry by May 31, 2006 on ways to ensure that Canada has a strong, internationally competitive telecommunications industry, which committee is composed of the following persons appointed by the Minister of Industry to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis: GERRI SINCLAIR of Vancouver, British Columbia, as Chairperson; ANDRÉ TREMBLAY of Montréal, Quebec, as a member; and HANK INTVEN of Toronto, Ontario, as a member.
AttachmentsAttachment
